T02D1523:77b-1: sva aa dhishtha'a na kra ma au pa de sha ka s'a dha na /
T02D1523:77b-3: rang byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag gi sgrub thabs bdag gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1523:77b-4: dngos min dngos med ma yin mkha' ltar ro mnyam rtogs par dka' ba'i rang bzhin can //
T02D1523:77b-5: gcig min du ma ma yin bdag dang gzhan la phun tshogs phan pa 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02D1523:77b-6: gnyas med bde chen bcom ldan he ru ka dpal 'jigs byed rgyal po 'bar ba'i sku //
T02D1523:77b-7: thub pa'i dbang po thugs rje rgyas shing bar chad med par gzhan don rdzogs mdzad rgyal //
T02D1523:77b-8: dang por re zhig sgrub pa pos lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas /
T02D1523:77b-9: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarbba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ho //
T02D1523:77b-10: zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D1523:77b-11: gzung bas der 'dzin med pa'i sems kyang med de
T02D1523:77b-12: zhes chos thams cad thog ma med pa nas rang
T02D1523:77b-13: bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i stong pa nyid du
T02D1523:77b-14: yud tsam gyis mngon par bya'o //
T02D1523:77b-15: de'i rjes la chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa nyid kyi ngang las /
T02D1523:78a-0: skad cig gis bcom ldan 'das thugs ka'i chu skyes dang nyi ma bzhugs @78a * //
T02D1523:78a-1: pa'i h'um gis de nyid kha dog sngon po //
T02D1523:78a-2: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin 'od zer dpag tu
T02D1523:78a-3: med pa 'phro ba can dang ldan pa rten dang
T02D1523:78a-4: brten pa'i tshul du rnam pa thams cad rdzogs par
T02D1523:78a-6: rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab zur bzhi ba'i steng du /
T02D1523:78a-7: sna tshogs padma'i lte ba dang ze 'brur ldan pa'i
T02D1523:78a-8: dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i bcom
T02D1523:78a-9: ldan 'das rje btsun dpal he ru ka sku mdog
T02D1523:78a-10: zar ma'i me tog sar pa lta bu zhal gcig
T02D1523:78a-12: shes rab la 'khyud pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa /
T02D1523:78a-13: g-yas brkyang ba 'jigs byed chen po dang dus mtshan mnan pa /
T02D1523:78a-14: mche ba gtsigs shing zhal rnam par 'gyur ba /
T02D1523:78a-16: spyi gtsug nor bus brgyan pa /
T02D1523:78a-17: sna tshogs rdo rje dang zla ba phyed pa dbu la 'dzin pa mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan /
T02D1523:78a-18: sum khugs su 'khyog cing dgyes pa'i cha byad can
T02D1523:78a-19: gyi dar dpyang dang cod pan gyis mdzes par byas
T02D1523:78a-20: pa / thod pa'i phreng ba can sgeg pa la sogs pa gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pa /
T02D1523:78a-21: stag gi pags pa'i na bza' 'dzin pa'i mchog /
T02D1523:78a-22: mi mgo rlon pa'i do shal gyis sku la brgyan
T02D1523:78a-23: ba / dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi phreng ba can phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1523:78a-24: de'i mdun du bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje rnal 'byor ma /
T02D1523:78a-25: sku mdog dmar mo gzhon zhing mdzes ma lang tsho dang ldan pa /
T02D1523:78a-28: phyag g-yas pa rdo rje dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis gdug pa can thams cad la bsdigs pa /
T02D1523:78a-29: phyag g-yon pa yab la 'khyud pas bdud la sogs pa'i khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa /
T02D1523:78a-30: dpral ba'i mtshams su thod pa lngas brgyan pa /
T02D1523:78a-31: dbu skra nag po'i tshogs grol ba /
T02D1523:78a-32: nam mkha'i na bza' bsnams pa phyag rgya lnga dang ldan ma /
T02D1523:78a-33: mi mgo skam po'i phreng ba can /
T02D1523:78a-34: g-yas kyis byin pa la 'khyud la /
T02D1523:78a-35: g-yon brkyang ma bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid can /
T02D1523:78a-36: de lta bu dang ldan pa snyoms par zhugs pa'i
T02D1523:78a-37: dga' bas brgyan pa'i bcom ldan 'das bskal pa'i me
T02D1523:78b-0: ltar 'bar ba'i gzi brjid @78b chen po dang ldan
T02D1523:78b-1: pa'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1523:78b-2: de dag ni bcom ldan 'das shes rab dang bcas pa'i sku rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1523:78b-3: de las skyo bar gyur na /
T02D1523:78b-4: aom hr'i: ha ha h'um h'um phat /
T02D1523:78b-5: ces bya ba'i sngags brjod bar bya'o //
T02D1523:78b-6: de ni dbang po tha ma'i dmigs pa bya'o //
T02D1523:78b-7: da ni dbang po 'bring gi ting nge 'dzin 'od
T02D1523:78b-8: gsal du 'jug pa dang ldan pa brjod par bya
T02D1523:78b-9: ste / de yang rang gi thugs ka na gnas pa'i h'um /
T02D1523:78b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid can
T02D1523:78b-11: de'i snang bas brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i rang bzhin
T02D1523:78b-12: can gyi khams mtha' dag 'od kyi rang bzhin du
T02D1523:78b-13: byas pa'i rjes su gzhig pa'i rim bas me long
T02D1523:78b-15: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin n'a da'i bar bsdus shing thim nas /
T02D1523:78b-16: de yang rim gyis phra bar gyur te /
T02D1523:78b-17: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin /
T02D1523:78b-18: chos sku 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo //
T02D1523:78b-19: dbyer med par bzhugs pa la blta bar bya'o //
T02D1523:78b-20: slar yang gdul bya'i bsod nams dang /
T02D1523:78b-21: rang gi smon lam gyi shugs kyis zung 'jug longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i ngo bor bzhengs te /
T02D1523:78b-22: de las sprul pa dpag tu med pa 'phros nas /
T02D1523:78b-23: sems can gyi khams mtha' dag gi don byed par bya'o //
T02D1523:78b-24: ril por 'dzin ba ni rnam grangs gzhan no //
T02D1523:78b-26: dbang po rab mchog tu gyur pas //
T02D1523:78b-27: zung 'jug longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
T02D1523:78b-28: stong pa'i ngo bo bde ba che //
T02D1523:78b-29: ji ltar snang bzhin bden spangs pa //
T02D1523:78b-30: me long nang gi gzugs brnyan bzhin //
T02D1523:78b-32: dmigs pa thams cad rnam spangs te //
T02D1523:78b-33: stong dang mi stong las 'das pa //
T02D1523:78b-34: de ni bdud dang nyon mongs tshogs //
T02D1523:78b-36: 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs shing drag / he ru kar grags chen por bzhengs //
T02D1523:78b-37: bla ma'i drin thob sgom phyir dga' //
T02D1523:78b-38: shugs kyis ye shes rab snang bas //
T02D1523:78b-39: phyogs bcur gsal bar byed bar shog / rang byin
T02D1523:78b-40: gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag gi sgrub thabs
T02D1523:78b-41: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po ku m'a ra
T02D1523:78b-42: shr'i dpal na lendra'i gtsug lag khang du sam skri
